formElement.label: Source Artifact Repository
formElement.documentation: Name of the source repository to sync from.

formElement.label: Target Artifact Repository
formElement.documentation: Name of the target repository to sync to.

formElement.label: Synchronization Resource
formElement.documentation: the name of the resource on which to run the synchronization.

formElement.label: Artifact Version Pattern
formElement.documentation: Pattern of artifact version to sync. Examples: MyGrp:MyKey:* (all artifact versions with group MyGrp and key MyKey), MyGrp:* (all artifact versions with group MyGrp), * (all artifact versions. This is the default).

formElement.label: Batch Size
formElement.documentation: Number of Artifact Versions to bring at once.
